Quality Education.reason: Course aims to enhance students' expertise and understanding of business ethics and sustainability.
evidence: Students will acquire and apply expertise in their respective fields.
Students will understand and be able to identify the ethics, social responsibility, and sustainability considerations of business situations.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Course focuses on managing businesses, relevant to economic growth.
evidence: Students will identify problems, develop and evaluate possible alternatives and make decisions.

evidence: Students can demonstrate innovative, entrepreneurial approaches to manage change.

evidence: 習得相關進階專業知識（Students will acquire and apply expertise in their respective fields.）

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to energy, renewable or otherwise.

evidence: 產業現況及未來發展趨勢

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course focuses on 'Industry status,' 'innovative... approaches,' and involves 'Enterprise visits,' directly aligning with industry and innovation.

創新方法、創業態度與面對變革的能力（Students can demonstrate innovative, entrepreneurial approaches to manage change.）

Reduced Inequalities.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to reducing inequality within or among countries.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to urban development, sustainable cities, or community resilience.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: A core competence is to 'understand and be able to identify the ethics, social responsibility, and sustainability considerations of business situations,' which directly relates to responsible production.
evidence: 理解與辨別商業環境中道德、社會責任與永續議題（Students will understand and be able to identify the ethics, social responsibility, and sustainability considerations of business situations.）

Climate Action.reason: The course mentions 'sustainability considerations,' which can be inferred to include climate issues, but there is no explicit mention of climate action.

Life Below Water.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to marine ecosystems, oceans, or life below water.

Life on Land.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to terrestrial ecosystems, biodiversity, or land use.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course includes identifying 'ethics... of business situations,' which can be inferred to support building accountable institutions at a corporate level.
evidence: 理解與辨別商業環境中道德、社會責任與永續議題

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course structure is built on partnerships, specifically 'Enterprise visits,' fostering collaboration between academia and industry for learning and achieving goals.
evidence: 團隊合作與領導能力（Students will be able to work effectively in teams as well as develop leadership skills.）
